author: B. Ross Ashley
comment: Running on a Galaxy Tab S, I cannot figure out how to open the widget as widget ... no matter what I do, the app opens full-page in white on black. Not a resizable widget as announced. Help?  Thanks for the help ... I HD forgotten how to do that.

reply.author: Carmen Alvarez
reply.content: Hi Ross. On Android, you typically add a widget by long pressing on your home screen, choosing "widgets", then searching for French Calendar among the list of widgets. The exact process varies slightly on different devices and launcher apps.

author: Shahriyar Khatami
comment: It would be a good idea to choose different fonts.

reply.author: Carmen Alvarez
reply.content: Thanks for the idea! This has just been released in version 1.10.0.

author: Kalem Tysick
comment: Never mind. I uninstalled, then re-installed and got it working and it's great. Exactly what I was looking for. It even had a decimal clock, so didn't need to download one of those as well. I can now pretend to my heart's content our time system made some natural sense, and I love that.

reply.author: Carmen Alvarez
reply.content: Could you try rebooting the phone? Some home screens don't display new widgets until after a restart.

author: Bernard Bratu
comment: No special permissions, no extra data collection. A simple app that does a simple thing: remind you of days long past, where ideals were more than that.
title: True to its content

author: mrredchannel30
comment: This calendar is much more logical and systematic, than our.
title: Vive la republique!

author: Greg Windsor
comment: Très utile et unique, je l'aime beaucoup! Une chose, c'est possible d'ajouter une option de choisir un style plus minimaliste, comme celui de l'horloge défaut? Juste une version sans rôle et avec une autre fonte? Merci beaucoup, en tout cas :)

reply.author: Carmen Alvarez
reply.content: Un widget minimaliste est maintenant disponible dans la version 1.3.0 de l'appli. N'hésitez pas à donner du feedback. Merci !

title: Trop cool

author: Aladin Q
comment: "Ah! ça ira, ça ira, ça ira." Installé un Quartidi, 24 Brumaire 223.
title: Sympa!

comment: Initially the widget didn't appear in my app list so I rebooted.  It now appears but when I try to use it by putting it on my phone "desktop" it vanishes like it's crashing.

reply.author: Carmen Alvarez
reply.content: Did you try to long press on your home screen, then choose widgets, then choose one of the two French Calendar Widgets? Or did you just add the app icon to the home screen? Please contact me so I can help you out.  Thanks!  c@rmen.ca

title: Doesn't work

author: A Google User
comment: Très sympa. Le système horaire est un peu plus perturbant. Pouvoir afficher le nom du jour de l'année à la place serait intéressant. :)
title: Énorme !

author: Pierre
comment: Parfait, juste ce que je cherchais

author: lilly iamurkarma
comment: Not what i was expecting. But it is OK
